injectCSS: section#main_shell{position:relative;left:27vh;height:95vh;bottom:2vh;}section#main_shell>h3.title{left:calc(27vh + 16.5vw)!important;}section#mod_column_right{left:27vh!important;}section#mod_column_right>h3.title{left:27.6vh!important;}div#mod_netstat_inner{height:6.85vh;padding-top:.5vh;}div#mod_globe_innercontainer{padding-bottom:.95vh;}div#mod_conninfo canvas{height:8vh!important;}section#filesystem{position: absolute; left: 0; top: 69vh;width:32vw;} section#filesystem>h3.title, section#filesystem>div{width:32vw} section#keyboard{display:none;}
